entry.title: Journey w/ Sheila - DPR Concert
entry.summary: When I was still dating Sheila, on August 2023 the tickets for DPR Concert went on sale. DPR is one of Sheila‚Äôs favorite K-POP group. She specifically likes Ian (as most people do LOL) as he was the most handsome in the group. She said she really wanted to watch it, but it would probably sell out within minutes! So I offered to buy it for her, as the internet connection at my office was quite q...

entry.title: Migrating From Windows To Proxmox
entry.summary: 2023-12-22 Tried installing a new GPU, GTX 1050 Ti to the server. And I needed to change the order of the NIC in the PCIE slot (because it won‚Äôt fit two GPUS in the configuration before). But turns out, proxmox wouldn‚Äôt boot. It might be because I have a few VMs automatically run at startup, and I still had the current GPU passed-through to a guest VM. Maybe should turn those off first, try cha...
